homeassistant._: Configuration for Home Assistant MQTT discovery
homeassistant.updateS?: Number of seconds between updates (default value: `60`)

system?._: Configuration for a system agent (key name is not used)
system?.name?: Display name for this device in Home Assistant (default value: current hostname)

exchange?._: Configuration for an Exchange agent (key name is not used)
exchange?.name?: Display name for this device in Home Assistant (default value: email)
